name: Sweet Desire 2
description:
Hentai game «Sweet Desire 2» consists of 10 levels! In each level a hot girl with beautiful body is eager to play with you!
Click on the girl to collect points. When the flask with a level of satisfaction is full, then the girl takes off her clothes!

«Sweet Desire 2» is created to satisfy all kinds of fantasies!
Inside the game you can undress the following girls:

— Maid. (A master of the house is hiding with a pretty housemaid in a big house. Hurry up to satisfy the maid before the wife finds out!)

— Sportswoman. (A sporty girl with beautiful body has come to a gym, but there is no one as she thinks. She is so hot and sweaty that she decides to take off her clothes. Luckily she can’t see you!)

— Geisha. (Beautiful geisha is bored, she is waiting for you to play strip game. Hope, that luck will be on your side!)

— Squaw. (You came to the beach and found a very attractive lost squaw. You help her find her way, but she doesn't know how to thank you! But you have a great idea!)

— Dark skinned girl. (A lonely man walks near the pool. Suddenly he sees a very attractive girl with dark skin. He has never seen black girls in his hometown, so he is very curious to at least talk to this unusual girl. The girl is in this city for only one day and, moreover, has never been with a white man. Despite the public space, boy and girl cannot overcome the desire for satisfaction from each other!)

— Nun. (A pretty young nun was alone for a long time. Now that no one is around, she decides to satisfy herself on her own. You are sitting in the next room and suddenly you hear inviting sounds and sighs. Trying not to reveal yourself, you hide and watch the hot girl!)

— and 4 more girls are waiting to play with you!


You should definitely play the game «Sweet Desire 2» to satisfy your sweet desire!
